BadgeDetail.Name: Mediator
BadgeDetail.Description: The earner of this badge is able to mediate a conflict. They are able to help diffuse a difficult situation, be fair, remain objective, keep dialogue ‘solutions focussed’ and ultimately help find a solution between two parties.

Task.Title: Mediate
Task.Body: Upload an account showing how you have mediated a conflict. Explain the nature of the dispute, how you helped mediate and the final agreement reached.
Task.HtmlBody: Upload an account showing how you have mediated a conflict. Explain the nature of the dispute, how you helped mediate and the final agreement reached.
Task.TextileBody: Upload an account showing how you have mediated a conflict. Explain the nature of the dispute, how you helped mediate and the final agreement reached.
